Diamond::

In snake mode, got hit and writhed on the floor.  The lightening 
sindged her scales and the shots hit hard.  She transformed into bot 
mode and lay on the floor. She got up, shaking on her hands and 
knees. She looked 
up at the bots. She hissed loudly at them and then stood up.  She had 
to escape before they killed her.  She then she looked up and saw 
another vent.  She drew her pistol and shot the vent cover off. She 
then drew her cross bow out and shot it at the vent.  She pulled 
herself up with the pully mechanism and crawled into the vent shaft 
again. She transformed into snake mode and slithered down the shaft, 
leaving a traiil of mech fluid behind her as she went.  She had burnt 
scales and holes from the shots.  She knew she wasn't going to make 
it long in this ship.  She turned the corner on the shaft.  She 
finally came to the vent that went to the cargo bay.  She pushed the 
vent cover off and slithered out.  She didn't transform and hit the 
ground with a thud in snake mode.  She could barely move.  She curled 
up her coils and stayed there near the cargo bay door way, waiting 
for them to find her again. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Treadshot/Hurricane:::
> 
> ::Treadshot pulls his arm away and fired 10 shots, and Hurricane 
fired 5 
> lightning bolts at Diamond::
